name: Sausage Toss
description: Tons of juicy sausages and hot dogs to toss on sharp objects you would never think possible.  A pizza slice, the moon, pineapple, lollipop, a bacon slice? Yes, they can all be a landing place for a juicy sausage. Call it what you want: weisswurst, blutwurst, hot dog - it all comes down to one simple satisfying task and you'll love all the funny physics arrangements, animations and effects that go along with it!!
